/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/-- **L'Hôpital's rule** for approaching +∞, `deriv` version -/
theorem lhopital_zero_at_top
    (hdf :
      «expr∀ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , »" at_top
        (differentiable_at (exprℝ) f x))
    (hg' :
      «expr∀ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , »" at_top
        (deriv g x ≠ 0))
    (hftop : tendsto f at_top ((nhds) 0)) (hgtop : tendsto g at_top ((nhds) 0))
    (hdiv : tendsto (fun x => (deriv f) x / (deriv g) x) at_top l) : tendsto (fun x => f x / g x) at_top l :=
  by
  have hdg :
    «expr∀ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , »" at_top
      (differentiable_at (exprℝ) g x) :=
    hg'.mp (eventually_of_forall fun _ hg' => by_contradiction fun h => hg' (deriv_zero_of_not_differentiable_at h))
  have hdf' :
    «expr∀ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , »" at_top
      (has_deriv_at f (deriv f x) x) :=
    hdf.mp (eventually_of_forall fun _ => differentiable_at.has_deriv_at)
  have hdg' :
    «expr∀ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , »" at_top
      (has_deriv_at g (deriv g x) x) :=
    hdg.mp (eventually_of_forall fun _ => differentiable_at.has_deriv_at)
  exact has_deriv_at.lhopital_zero_at_top hdf' hdg' hg' hftop hgtop hdiv
#align lhopital_zero_at_top lhopital_zero_at_top
lhopital_zero_at_bot_on_Iio:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem lhopital_zero_at_bot_on_Iio (hdf : differentiable_on (exprℝ) f (Iio a)) (hg' : ∀ x ∈ Iio a, (deriv g) x ≠ 0)
    (hfbot : tendsto f at_bot ((nhds) 0)) (hgbot : tendsto g at_bot ((nhds) 0))
    (hdiv : tendsto (fun x => (deriv f) x / (deriv g) x) at_bot l) : tendsto (fun x => f x / g x) at_bot l :=
  by
  have hdf : ∀ x ∈ Iio a, differentiable_at (exprℝ) f x := fun x hx => (hdf x hx).differentiable_at (Iio_mem_nhds hx)
  have hdg : ∀ x ∈ Iio a, differentiable_at (exprℝ) g x := fun x hx =>
    by_contradiction fun h => hg' x hx (deriv_zero_of_not_differentiable_at h)
  exact
    has_deriv_at.lhopital_zero_at_bot_on_Iio (fun x hx => (hdf x hx).has_deriv_at) (fun x hx => (hdg x hx).has_deriv_at)
      hg' hfbot hgbot hdiv
#align lhopital_zero_at_bot_on_Iio lhopital_zero_at_bot_on_Iio
